From The University of Vermont Center for Research on Vermont:

More than 100 students fanned out to thirty town meetings in Vermont on Saturday, Monday and Tuesday, gathering data, producing short videos and studying “real democracy.” The “Real Democracy” score combines attendance and participation rates. Frank Bryan documented in Real Democracy many factors that contribute to this score including the size of the town, whether the meeting was held in the morning or evening, and issues under debate.

Source: https://www.uvm.edu/cas/vermontresearch/town-meeting-project-2019-town-data-overview
